Articles.Content:
My favourite gaming site Gamespot has made a short video featuring KSP!

Watch it here:

http://www.gamespot.com/kerbal-space-program/videos/kerbal-space-program-rocket-science-made-simple-6407511/?tag=Topslot;KerbalSpaceProgram;KerbalSpaceProgramRoc;WatchItNow

I think he did a nice job with his rockets
